cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.23)

set(BUILD_TESTING FALSE CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(CATCH_INSTALL_DOCS FALSE CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(CATCH_INSTALL_EXTRAS FALSE CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(CATCH_DEVELOPMENT_BUILD FALSE CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(CATCH_BUILD_TESTING FALSE CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(CATCH_ENABLE_WERROR FALSE CACHE INTERNAL "")

add_subdirectory(Catch2)

set(EIGEN_BUILD_DOC OFF CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(EIGEN_BUILD_TESTING OFF CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(EIGEN_BUILD_PKGCONFIG OFF CACHE INTERNAL "")
